SELECT * FROM extbrandinfo WHERE brandCode IN
(#{item})
mapper.update:
update extbrandinfo
entId = #{entId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
brandName = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandSCode = #{brandSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandCode = #{brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandTypeCode = #{brandTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandLevelCode = #{brandLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandEnName = #{brandEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
designer = #{designer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brandDesc = #{brandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erpCode = #{erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
erpName = #{erpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sourceFromCode = #{sourceFromCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealStatus = #{dealStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lang = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updateDate = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
brandOriginCountryCode = #{brandOriginCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where brandCode = #{brandCode} and erpCode=#{erpCode} and entId=#{entId}
mapper.insert:
insert into extbrandinfo (ebrandId, entId, erpCode, brandName, brandSCode, brandCode, brandTypeCode, brandLevelCode, brandEnName, designer, brandDesc, status, sourceFromCode, dealStatus, lang, creator, createDate, modifier, updateDate,brandOriginCountryCode) values
(#{item.ebrandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.entId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.erpCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandSCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandLevelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.designer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.brandDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sourceFromCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dealStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.brandOriginCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
